reviews.text: Very homely! Foodâ€™s good and makes me feel like home! Must get the assam crayfish like please, that was really amazing! Strongly recommend their sambal sotong, sambal petai and buah keluak! Their batik cloths are really pretty too! Everyoneâ€™s really friendly and kind too! Overall a very good experience!

Food was great! The fish head curry and ngoh hiang was really good as promised by the reviews:)) The ngoh hiang was really crispy and the fish head curry broth was rich and tangy! The fish was tender too!

Brought my family there for my birthday dinner and when the owner found out, they were really nice and gifted me one of their batik cloths! :â€™) Thank you so much!! ðŸ’•

Simply peranakan cuisine offers an exceptional dining experience with truly authentic food. From the moment we arrive, the warm place made us feel like home. The interior beautifully reflects the rich heritage of peranakan culture, creating a cozy atmosphere.

The food is a true highlight, with dishes like ayam buah keluak, standing out for their deep flavors and perfect balance of spices. The beef rendang was incredibly tender. To top of it all, the desserts were the perfect sweet ending. We had an amazing time savoring the delicious food while soaking in the peranakan ambiance. The service making the experience even more memorable.

assam fish head curry: very tender and delicate. The taste of the curry soup just topnotch! Not too strong, which is i like it very much

sambal Kang Kong: very smoky taste and garlicky, once you eat, you will never stop eating that kangkung.

Beef rendang : the meat very tender, and you can feel the coconut and the rich of ingredient just there. Recommended

Went to Simply Peranakan and my parents really liked the food. The dishes were piping hot and hearty, and the tender babi poteng is great for older family members. (My personal favourite was the mian xian.)

And the service was amazing!
Awesome food and really good service. Great location in town; reasonable prices. Will definitely come back.
